title: 命令方块怎么刷出一身都是附魔装备的僵尸！

replies.author: LBL~
replies.txt_content:
/summon Zombie ~ ~1 ~ 
{Equipment:[{id:iron_axe,tag:{ench:[{id:16,lvl:11}]}},{id:iron_boots,tag:{ench:[{id:1,lvl:10}]}},{id:gloden_leggins,tag:{ench:[{id:1,lvl:10}]}},{id:diamond_chestplate,tag:{ench:[{id:1,lvl:10}]}},{id:glass,tag:{ench:[{id:1,lvl:10}]}}]}复制代码

这是拿铁斧，头戴玻璃块，穿钻石甲，穿金裤，穿铁靴的僵尸
是用tag连接

replies.author: ChallengerX
replies.txt_content:
/summon Zombie ~ ~1 ~ {Equipment:[{id:283,Count:1},{id:317,Count:1},{id:316,Count:1},{id:315,Count:1},{id:314,Count:1}],DropChances:[1.0F,1.0F,1.0F,1.0F,1.0F]}
283是金剑，317,316,315,314分别是金靴子、金胖次、金衣服、金(lv)帽子，可以改成别的，后面的DropChances是掉落几率，0.0F~1.0F
